titles.title: A resolution amending paragraph 2 and 3(a) of Rule XXV.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/12/1987--Introduced. Amends rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate to increase the number of Senators on the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry and the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs, and to decrease the number of Senators on the Committee on Foreign Relations. Provides authority for Senators to serve on specified committees during the 100th Congress while continuing service on certain other committees.
